title: ‘The Last Descent Was Super Dangerous:’ No Fractures for Wout van Aert, World Championships Uncertain
content:
Van Aert returns home to recover from horrific Vuelta crash as Visma-Lease a Bike faces another setback: 'We feel for him.'

Read the full article at ‘The Last Descent Was Super Dangerous:’ No Fractures for Wout van Aert, World Championships Uncertain on Velo.
author: ahood
